## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G14800](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G14800)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AT-P5C1, AT-P5R, EMB2772, P5CR</u>
- **Gene Name:** PYRROLINE-5- CARBOXYLATE (P5C) REDUCTASE, EMBRYO DEFECTIVE 2772, pyrroline-5- carboxylate (P5C) reductase
- **Description:**   pyrroline-5- carboxylate (P5C) reductase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2185435
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
